interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SOFTACULOUS Foot Peeling Mask Booties – 2 Pairs, Baby Soft Skin in 7 Days
Review Date: 2021/01/05
Store: SuiteMade
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.91 x 1.14 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'STM-FMP-LAV', 'UPC': '734038263785'}
Review Text: This was my first time using a foot peel, so I feel like this product didnt provide enough information for first time users. Directions said to put booties on feet. I wasnt sure if i should take them out of the plastic, so i didnt because there was alot of liquid in them. The packets also said to not use if you are breastfeeding or pregnant so that was concerning - not sure what is in it or how it effects milk, but i still pump for my daughter. I kept these securely on my feet for the directed amount of time and then took them off and took a shower. A couple days later my right foot started to peel first but got really itchy so i think i scratched off some of the peeling skin. The description says it will peel in about a week and leave skin smooth but my whole foot didnt peel and I still have patches of dried skin and calluses. Idk if I was suppose to keep socks/ slippers off  during this time but it didnt completely work for me for whatever reason. Maybe if they provided a more detailed instruction process I couldve been more successful?
Review Title: feet didnt peel fully, still had rough spots
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Godefroy Tint Kit for Spot Coloring, Dark Brown Godefroy ['Godefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit is ideal for coloring small areas of the scalp and facial hair. Pre-measured in separate capsule units, it gives you the versatility to use the exact amount of color with no waste. Great for use on beards, mustaches, sideburns, & temple, anywhere you need a little color. Also can be used for root touch ups in between hair color treatments. No odor & Blends well with existing color'] {'Color': 'Dark Brown', 'Brand': 'Godefroy', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.5 x 2.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '203', 'UPC': '852661595933 604106323737 186297000067 726714358472 801276566487', 'Manufacturer': 'Godefroy'} i searched "dark brown eyebrow tint" and this came up and i was about to make the purchase until i fully read the description "This product must not be used for dyeing the eyelashes and eyebrows. To do so may cause blindness" so i dont know why people are condoning the use of this product on their eyebrows/ eye area. i guess they dont care there is a chance of losing eye sight. also amazon needs to remove this from results for eyebrow tint... glad i saw before i bought! Not for use near eyes! may cause blindness! Segbeauty empty bottle 290 TruuMe {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Material Type Free': 'Dairy Free', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Bottle Nipple Type': 'Vented', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 3.19 x 2.24 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-03', 'UPC': '701822757553 701822760621'} This mister is awesome! I got it to use on my house plants and it works great. It holds a little of 5oz, the mist very fine, handle is easy to pull, and it's a continuous spray for few seconds per handle pump! Might consider using on my hair in the future too!

Please let me know if you have any questions about my review, or if you have found it of any help to you. Works great as a plant mister QIC 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, Fiber Mascara, Waterproof Mascara, Natural Thick Thickening and Lengthening Mascara Lasting All Day Joruby {'Brand': 'Joruby', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '5.3 x 0.8 x 0.8 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} Disappointed in this product because it did not work for me. I took a couple pictures showing and comparing my eyelashes before and after applying. The mascara was a little pastey but step 1 applied ok and looked fine, but step 2 completely ruined my eyelashes. It looked horrible; The left side got clumped together and the right side looked like my eyelashes were growing baby eyelashes. Very unnatural looking. This claims to be flake free but after it dried i noticed a few little black specks on my cheeks. I had to use one of my old dried up mascara brushes to separate my lashes to fix them. It's also very hard to wash off. After step 2 my eyelashes looked horrible Magnesium Serum For Kids - All Natural Rub for Kids and Babies, Toxic Free + Free Magnesium Chart PDF Raise Them Well {'Brand': 'Raise Them Well', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl. Oz', 'Flavor': 'Unflavored', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.41 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '853647007044', 'Manufacturer': 'Raise Them Well'} I got this to use on my 1 year old! The quality seemed great (all natural, organic and enhanced with fulvic acid!). Ithought it could help her sleep better especially on nights where she is having a hard time (due to teething for an example.) Its easy to apply, rubs in and absorbs well but does feel a little sticky afterwards. It doesnt have much of a smell either maybe a little like lavender but gentle. Ive been doing one pump and rubbing it on her feet and she likes the little foot massage. I could tell it helps her sleep better. She wakes up/squirms less, maybe helping her get a deeper sleep. Very happy to have this for the rough nights. Works well, a little sticky after-feeling Empty Clear Glass Spray Bottles 2-PACK,Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist Settings Cherry {'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.5 x 3.4 inches; 1.4 Pounds', 'UPC': '791523234156'} These are sturdy glass bottles. I have a couple amber colored bottles but I wanted to get a couple glear bottles. The spray nozzles have long tubes that go all the way down to the bottom of the glass bottle so you could get every last drop out! The spray top only has 2 options: off and on, and the on is a very fine misted spray- No stream setting like most bottles, so that could be a con depending on what you want to use it for. It would be ideal for misting (like plants or hair) I will also be using these for making my own cleaning products. Only sprays a fine mist, ideal for plants Ice Roller for Face & Eye by Charmlily, Puffiness, Migraine, Pain Relief - Cold Facial Massager Treatment to Reduce Puffy Face & Tighten Pores, Under Eye Wrinkles (Pink) CHARMLILY {'Brand': 'CHARMLILY', 'Special Feature': 'Heat', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Not Water Resistant', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 3.54 x 2.48 inches; 6.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '679360098356', 'Manufacturer': 'CHARMLILY'} i get frequent puffiness under my eyes. The usual go to is a frozen spoon or ice cube, but came across this and decided to get it. Its easier to use and more convenient. You dont have to worry about your hand getting cold because the roller part is the only thing that goes in the freezer. It gently massages and soothes eyes and other areas youd like to treat. I think this would also make a nice gift! It is a little bigger than expected so it may be harder to reach small areas. good alternative to frozen spoons or ice cubes SOFTACULOUS Foot Peeling Mask Booties – 2 Pairs, Baby Soft Skin in 7 Days SuiteMade {'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.91 x 1.14 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'STM-FMP-LAV', 'UPC': '734038263785'} This was my first time using a foot peel, so I feel like this product didnt provide enough information for first time users. Directions said to put booties on feet. I wasnt sure if i should take them out of the plastic, so i didnt because there was alot of liquid in them. The packets also said to not use if you are breastfeeding or pregnant so that was concerning - not sure what is in it or how it effects milk, but i still pump for my daughter. I kept these securely on my feet for the directed amount of time and then took them off and took a shower. A couple days later my right foot started to peel first but got really itchy so i think i scratched off some of the peeling skin. The description says it will peel in about a week and leave skin smooth but my whole foot didnt peel and I still have patches of dried skin and calluses. Idk if I was suppose to keep socks/ slippers off during this time but it didnt completely work for me for whatever reason. Maybe if they provided a more detailed instruction process I couldve been more successful? feet didnt peel fully, still had rough spots
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user continues to focus on hair coloring products for touch-ups while exploring multifunctional misting solutions for hair. Their interest extends to health-conscious, high-performance beauty products. They are also exploring foot care solutions but exhibit caution with new types of products. Recent interactions indicate a growing appreciation for tools that provide convenience and effectiveness, as well as a focus on versatile solutions.

- **Color Preference:** They prefer dark brown shades for hair coloring.

- **Awareness and Caution:** The user maintains a strong emphasis on safety, particularly for sensitive areas like the eyes and skin. They prioritize detailed product descriptions and instructions to mitigate health risks and ensure effectiveness, as illustrated by their recent foot care experience, which left them concerned about insufficient guidance.

- **Skepticism Towards Popular Use:** A critical view persists toward products lacking specificity of use, with a preference for items that prioritize safety and clarity over convenience.

- **Buying Behavior:** Their purchasing approach is characterized by thorough research, a demand for quality, and a consideration of products that offer practical benefits. They appreciate effective solutions but expect comprehensive instructions to enhance their experience.

Overall, the user demonstrates a consistent high standard for safety and effectiveness across various product categories, particularly in beauty and wellness, showcasing a willingness to adopt innovative solutions that align with their health and safety values while maintaining a cautious approach to new products.
